transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan sir jaise hum bata rahe the na ji aap kehte the tabhi batana jab koi dikkat aayegi humne abhi na nendrolone ki lead li thi ji.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello samjhe
Executive: Haan sun raha hun boliye.
Customer: Haan uska likha hua tha 100 piece.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: 50000 ek lakh rupaye tak ka order ji.
Hamne usko matlab ki lead li phone kiya wo kehta humne to ek piece lena hai teen saal purana matlab ki aapka customer hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Matlab ki aise na hame matlab ki isliye hum bol rahe the iska iska mujhe na ek bar detail na whatsapp hai aapke pass kis ka number hai se bataiye.
Executive: To usko detail mere pass dono number pe whatsapp hai ji jis se baat kar raha hun usse bheju.
Customer: Haan whatsapp pe aap bhej dijiye uska detail jo aapne consume kiya uska hum verify abhi karwa le rahe hain sir.
Executive: Haan karan kya hai hame main nahi kehta hame isliye lag raha hai ji bhi hamare sath jo baat aapse kal bhi isliye aapne baat karai meeting karai hum aap lag raha hai bhi aap galat keh rahe hain hum galat kyu kahenge ji.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kyunki abhi ki baat hai ek minute pehle bas matlab ki.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi main verify karwata hun abhi.
Executive: Haan theek hai sir theek hai main isi number pe bhejta hun screenshot lekar ke.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a buylead with incorrect details.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to verify the details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, whatsapp
